Class BeerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • BeerService

  • public class BeerService
extends Object

    The BeerService class acts as the SERVICE LAYER and has the WebService annotation.

    Author:
    Alex Aiezza

      String[] getBeers(String token)
      Takes a string denoting a token and returns a list of the known beers if the token is valid.
      String getCheapest(String token)
      Takes a string denoting a token and returns the name of the least expensive beer if the token is valid.
      String getCostliest(String token)
      Takes a string denoting a token and returns the name of the most expensive beer if the token is valid.

      Takes no arguments and returns a list of the methods contained in the service.

      Takes a string denoting the beer brand and a string denoting a token and returns a double representing the beer price if the token is valid.

      Takes a string denoting the username, a string denoting a password and returns a "token" string if the username and password match.

      Takes a string denoting the beer brand, a double denoting the price and a string denoting a token returns true or false depending on success and if the token is valid.

            throws ParseException,

    • Method Detail

      • getToken

        public String getToken(String username,
                       String password)
                throws UserNotFoundException,
                       UserUnderageException,
                       AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException
        Takes a string denoting the username, a string denoting a password and returns a "token" string if the username and password match.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        Returns:
        a token that will expire after a certain amount of time. This is null if user does not exist.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - Thrown if the given username is not found
        UserUnderageException - Thrown when an underage user attempts to become authorized
        AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException - Thrown when an given username does not have a token

      • getMethods

        public String[] getMethods()
        Takes no arguments and returns a list of the methods contained in the service.
        Returns:
        a list of the methods contained in the service.

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice(String beerName,
                       String token)
        Takes a string denoting the beer brand and a string denoting a token and returns a double representing the beer price if the token is valid.
        Parameters:
        beerName - the name of the beer to get the price of
        token - the authentication token for accessing this method
        Returns:
        The price of the given beer

      • setPrice

        public boolean setPrice(String beerName,
                        double price,
                        String token)
                 throws UserHasInsufficientPrivilegesException,
                        AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException,
                        TokenExpiredException,
                        BeerServiceClosedException
        Takes a string denoting the beer brand, a double denoting the price and a string denoting a token returns true or false depending on success and if the token is valid.
        Parameters:
        beerName - the name of the beer to set the price of
        price - the new price of the given beer
        token - authentication token for accessing this method
        Returns:
        true if the new price was set
        Throws:
        AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException - Thrown if the tokenHash given does not exist.
        TokenExpiredException - Thrown when the tokenHash given is expired.
        BeerServiceClosedException - Thrown if the Beer Service is being accessed outside of working hours.
        UserHasInsufficientPrivilegesException - Thrown if the user associated with the given authentication token has insufficient privleges for accessing this method.

      • getBeers

        public String[] getBeers(String token)
        Takes a string denoting a token and returns a list of the known beers if the token is valid.
        Parameters:
        token - authentication token for accessing this method
        Returns:
        the names of all the beers in the database

      • getCheapest

        public String getCheapest(String token)
        Takes a string denoting a token and returns the name of the least expensive beer if the token is valid.
        Parameters:
        token - authentication token for accessing this method
        Returns:
        The name of the least expensive beer

      • getCostliest

        public String getCostliest(String token)
        Takes a string denoting a token and returns the name of the most expensive beer if the token is valid.
        Parameters:
        token - authentication token for accessing this method
        Returns:
        The name of the most expensive beer.
